function.name: mongo_delete
function.description: Delete objects from collection using query. If query is a string, it will delete the document with that id, otherwise it will delete all objects that match the query. See below for required syntax of a mongo query. If mongo is not provided the last active connection will be used.

example.description: Deleting the document with id “John_Doe_1” from the “employees” collection:
Deleting all objects from the “employees” collection where “age” < 18.
